solutions.name: Administration
solutions.description: Provides a centralised administration interface for support agents to access tools and perform their daily duties.

solutions.name: Complaints
solutions.description: Manages the end-to-end process for logging, tracking, and resolving customer complaints in a compliant and timely manner. (Salesforce?)

solutions.name: Contact
solutions.description: Manages the creation and initiation of all inbound and outbound customer contact events across various channels. (Genesys)

solutions.name: Contact History
solutions.description: Maintains a comprehensive and compliant historical record of all customer interactions across every communication channel.

solutions.name: Conversation
solutions.description: Manages real-time call controls during a customer conversation, including holds, transfers, and consultations with other agents. (Genesys)

solutions.name: Exception Administration
solutions.description: Provides a specialised interface for support agents to manage and resolve system-generated exceptions.

solutions.name: Exceptions Workflow
solutions.description: Manages the lifecycle of system-generated exceptions, including categorisation, prioritisation, and assignment to agents for resolution

solutions.name: Feedback
solutions.description: Captures, categorises, and analyses customer feedback to drive service improvements and product enhancements. (Qualtrics)

solutions.name: Genesys Advisor Assist Web Messaging Testing Tool
solutions.description: Performs automated testing of Genesys Chatbots and architect flows using scripted dialogues and conversational AI to ensure quality and reliability.

solutions.name: Identity Verification
solutions.description: Manages the process of verifying a customer's identity to prevent fraud and ensure inbound contacts are routed securely and appropriately.

solutions.name: Inbound Contact
solutions.description: Orchestrates the handling of all incoming customer communications from channels such as phone, email, chat, and social media. (Genesys)

solutions.name: Knowledge Base
solutions.description: A centralised repository of support articles and documentation, enabling agents to efficiently find up-to-date information for resolving customer issues and exceptions.

solutions.name: Outbound Contact
solutions.description: Orchestrates proactive outbound communications with customers via channels like phone and email. (Genesys)

solutions.name: Outbound Contact Campaign
solutions.description: Manages the creation and execution of targeted outbound dialing campaigns to achieve specific business goals, such as debt collection or sales.

solutions.name: Routing
solutions.description: Intelligently routes incoming customer contacts to the most appropriate agent or automated system, providing callers with wait time information and callback options

solutions.name: Support Administration
solutions.description: Provides a dedicated interface for support agents to directly manage and assist customers with their accounts and inquiries.

solutions.name: Support Administration
solutions.description: The service helps advisors view and manage customer casework efficiently.

solutions.name: Support Agents
solutions.description: Provides performance insights and management tools for support agents, covering feedback, process adherence, and training requirements.

solutions.name: Support Workflow
solutions.description: Manages the lifecycle of a customer support case, including categorisation, prioritisation, and assignment to the appropriate support agents. (Salesforce)

solutions.name: Support Workforce
solutions.description: Provides workforce management capabilities, including forecasting contact volumes and scheduling agent staffing levels to meet service demand.

solutions.name: Vulnerability
solutions.description: Manages the identification and recording of customer vulnerabilities (e.g., Priority Services Register) to ensure appropriate service, triage, and care.

members.name: Daniel Mortensen
generalCompetencies: Apex which is a Java-like language native to Salesforce

dailySkillset: We use salesforce proprietary languages apex
